explains: n. 平日，普通日；工作日

sentences.en: There are several free hours every weekday.
sentences.cn: 每个工作日都有几个小时的空闲时间。

sentences.en: You need to avoid riding during weekday rush periods.
sentences.cn: 你要避免在工作日高峰时段骑车。

sentences.en: If you normally do your fruit shopping on Saturday, choose a weekday night to go instead.
sentences.cn: 如果你通常在周六买水果，那就选择一个工作日的晚上再去。
